mapper.select: SELECT t.todo_id AS todoId, t.exercise_id AS exerciseId, e.name AS exerciseName, t.sets_number AS setsNumber, t.reps_target AS repsTarget, t.rest_time AS restTime, t.is_completed AS isCompleted, t.is_done AS isDone FROM todos t JOIN exercises e ON t.exercise_id = e.exercise_id WHERE t.date = #{date} ORDER BY t.todo_id ASC;
mapper.update: UPDATE todos SET date = #{date}, exercise_id = #{exerciseId}, sets_number = #{setsNumber}, reps_target = #{repsTarget}, rest_time = #{restTime}, is_completed = #{isCompleted}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE todo_id = #{todoId};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM todos WHERE date = #{date}
mapper.update: UPDATE todos SET rest_time = #{restTime}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE todo_id = #{todoId};
